articles.title: DPRK Permanent Representative to UN Sends Letter to UNSC President
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Warmongers' More Frantic War Moves
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The permanent representative of the DPRK to the UN on Friday sent a letter to the president of the UNSC with regard to another large-scale naval joint military exercises staged by the U.S. on the Korean peninsula in its attempt to launch a preemptive nuclear strike against the DPRK.
					 The joint military exercises conducted by the U.S. one after another all the year round on the Korean peninsula are clearly aggressive war exercises in their nature and scale, the letter said.
					
					 Involved in the naval exercises are the strike forces of the nuclear aircraft carrier Ronald Reagan, three nuclear submarines including the Michigan, Aegis destroyers and more than 40 other battleships and fighters of all kinds.
					
					 The naval rehearsal has further strained the tension on the Korean peninsula as it was launched after the U.S. chief executive made the most ferocious declaration of war in history by crying out for "totally destruction" of the DPRK, it pointed out, and went on:
					
					 What cannot be overlooked is the fact that the U.S., not being contented with the joint military exercises on the Korean peninsula, is kicking up the racket of military pressure upon the DPRK on a world-wide scale while getting more undisguised in its attempt to introduce NATO and other armed forces of its followers into the peninsula in case of emergency.
					
					 The large-scale joint military exercises, started by the U.S. against the DPRK in the Cold War era, are staged several times every year with mobilization of more nuclear strategic assets on a larger scale of the more aggressive nature after the Cold War era. As such, they constitute clear threat to international peace and security.
					
					 Proceeding therefrom, the DPRK, in accordance with Article 34 and Article 35 of the UN Charter, requests the UN Security Council to bring up the U.S. joint military exercises as its urgent agenda item for discussion.
					
					 No other country in the world than the DPRK has ever been subjected to such an extreme and direct nuclear threat from the U.S. for such a long time and witnessed on its door such nuclear war exercises which are the most vicious and ferocious in their scale, style, aim and essence.
					
					 The UN Security Council, in conformity with its mandate, should accept our request for ensuring peace and security of the Korean peninsula, and thus eliminate the root cause of aggravated tension and war on the Korean peninsula and make practical contribution to promoting international peace and security.
					
					 Should the UNSC ignore again the DPRK's just and aboveboard request, it will reveal by itself more clearly that the Security Council has now become a political tool of an individual power by giving up its mission and turning its back on the trust of the international community.

articles.title: DPRK Women's Team Secures Berth for Semifinals
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Team Secures Berth for Semifinals 
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The DPRK women's team beat its Chinese rival 2-0 on Saturday at the 2017 AFC U-19 Women's Championship and secured a berth for the semifinals.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK has recently issued new stamps (four individuals) introducing fine art pieces created in the 19th century and early years of the 20th century.
					 Carried in the stamps are fine arts "Lotus and Water Bird" and "Magnolia and Chicken" drawn in the 19th century and "Carp and Killifish" and "Dogs Barking at the Moon" by Jo Sok Jin (1853-1920) and Ri To Yong (1884-1933), well-known painters early in the 20th century.
					
					 Those pieces show well the colorful richness of Korean painting and are regarded as precious national fine art heritages.

articles.title: Intangible Heritages Newly Registered in DPRK
articles.content:
Intangible Heritages Newly Registered in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Twenty three national and local intangible heritages were newly registered in the DPRK amid the work for preserving intangible heritages encouraged on a nationwide scale.
					 They include the white ceramics technique with over 1000 year-long history, Korean-style roofing and loach soup of Kaesong City, silk production technology and Korean chess with a thousand and several hundreds year-long history as well as the legend of Sol Juk Hwa, anecdotage of Master Kim nicknamed phoenix, basic movements of Korean dance and haegum (Korean fiddle) making.
					
					 Now, the number of registered national and local intangible heritages reaches over 100 pieces.
					
					 According to Om Won Ho, department director of the National Authority for the Protection of Cultural Heritage, the registration of intangible heritages as national and world cultural heritages is a patriotic work to add luster to the superior spiritual and cultural heritages of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Green and Functional Building Materials
articles.content:
Green and Functional Building Materials
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang international sci-tech exhibition of furniture and building materials was held on October 16-20.
					 What caught visitors' eyes were functional furniture, good for human health and efficacious for cancer and cardiovascular and brain diseases, which were presented by the Yonggwang Furniture Joint Venture Company.
					
					 Vermiculite building materials made by the Wonbong Joint Venture Company and Chongjin Slate Factory also drew great attention of visitors.
					
					 They are regarded as the typical green building materials of the 21st century for promoting the formative and aesthetic view of structure and having good effects on human body and environment.
					
					 According to an official concerned, these building materials emit far infrared rays to keep room warm and prevent humidity and anion to prevent bronchial disorder, asthma and hypertensive disease and relieve fatigue.

articles.title: DPRK's Nukes Are Deterrent for Peace and Security: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK's Nukes Are Deterrent for Peace and Security: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and its vassal forces are now making nonsensical remarks, frightened by the rapid development of the state nuclear force of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea nearing its final stage.
					 However, the self-defensive character and mission of the DPRK's nuclear force can never change despite anyone's twisting or denial of it.
					
					 Steadfast is the principled stand of the DPRK to decisively smash the aggressive challenges of the hostile forces with its nuclear deterrent of justice and reliably defend peace and security in the Korean peninsula, Northeast Asia and the rest of the world, Rodong Sinmun says in an article Saturday, adding:
					
					 Our nuclear weapons are a precious fruition borne out by the bloody struggle of our people to protect the destiny and sovereignty of the country from the U.S. imperialists' nuclear threats.
					
					 The DPRK took the option for nuclear access to root out the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and its unilateral nuclear threats and blackmail.
					
					 Its nukes are the powerful deterrent that reliably ensures peace and security in the Korean peninsula and Northeast Asia and guarantees the sovereignty and rights to existence and development of the Korean people. And they are the treasured sword of justice that helps remove the dark clouds of nuclear war by the imperialists seeking to impose a horrible disaster upon mankind and provide the blue sky for the people to lead an independent happy life.
					
					 Our nuclear weapons are aimed at the U.S., empire of evils, from A to Z, and they will never be a threat to any other country of the world.
					
					 The DPRK will not flinch even an inch in building up its state nuclear force but vigorously advance toward the final victory along the road chosen by itself, no matter whatever others may say.

articles.title: Peace Is Guaranteed by DPRK's Nuclear Deterrent: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Peace Is Guaranteed by DPRK's Nuclear Deterrent: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists set in motion their vassal forces to rig up "sanctions resolutions" of the UNSC to destroy the sovereignty, rights to existence and development of the DPRK this year. Not content with it, they have expanded the scale and number of nuclear war drills, crying out for "total destruction" of the DPRK.
					 This is no more than the last-ditch efforts of those on the death bed, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article, adding:
					
					 Although the U.S. imperialists sway nuclear weapons, this can never work on the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear weapons provides peace and security in the Korean peninsula and Northeast Asia and other parts of the world.
					
					 Its nuclear weapons serve as precious deterrent that firmly preserves peace and security in the peninsula and Northeast Asia and reliably guarantees the sovereignty and rights to existence and development of the Korean nation.
					
					 When it bolsters up the nuclear force, its dignity will be raised and its might increased in every way.
					
					 The DPRK's nukes will mercilessly smash the nuclear stick of the brigandish U.S. imperialists so as to keep injustice from raising its head again.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Hit for Military Provocation Moves
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Hit for Military Provocation Moves
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Commentaries of the DPRK's leading papers Saturday condemn the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces for going reckless in military provocation to threaten the DPRK by introducing the nuclear assets into the Korean peninsula.
					 They launched the largest-ever joint naval maneuver in the East and West Seas of Korea under the pretext of "improving the capability of carrying out a joint operation". Involved in the war games were the U.S. nuclear carrier Ronald Reagan strike group and Michigan and other two nuclear subs and more than 40 warships and fighters of various missions including Aegis destroyers.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun comments that they are driving the situation of the Korean peninsula into the touch-and-go situation through such DPRK-targeted joint drills.
					
					 The prevailing situation fully reveals the true colors of war-thirsty U.S. and south Korean puppet forces as they are getting frantic with the move to start a nuclear war, disturbing the peace and security in the Korean peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia, the daily says, and goes on:
					
					 The adventurous action of the U.S. imperialists to provoke a nuclear war against the DPRK, threatening it by force of arms, has reached its climax.
					
					 It is a daydream for the U.S. to try to threaten and frighten the DPRK to make it stop bolstering up the state nuclear force.
					
					 No matter how desperately they may work, the DPRK will never stop it but accomplish it without fail.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the army and people of the DPRK will clearly show the world and history how the trigger-happy forces will meet their doom through the final victory in the standoff with the U.S.

articles.title: U.S. Bullying Diplomacy Can Never Work: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Bullying Diplomacy Can Never Work: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is making all efforts to realize "closely interlocked all-out pressure diplomacy toward the DPRK", stirring up the whole world.
					 Through the "diplomacy", the U.S. envisages making other countries cut off or cut down political, diplomatic, economic and military relations with the DPRK with a view to totally blockading it and making it yield. Mobilized for such moves are all those in power ranging from the present White House boss to vice-president, state secretary and even assistant state secretary. The U.S. is thinking of the whole world to be involved in it, to say nothing of the regional big powers and even small islands.
					
					 It is threatening the international community to choose between north Korea and the U.S. This is a stop-gap measure and the last-ditch efforts of those who sustained repeated setbacks in the political and military stand-off with the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. styling itself the "world's only superpower" seems to have fallen into an awkward situation as it requests even a small island in the Pacific, a country which it did not take any notice of in the ordinary days, to join in the anti-DPRK sanctions and pressure campaign.
					
					 If the U.S. acts are truly legitimate and fair and understandable by the international community, it would be needless for it to request or threaten other countries by mobilizing not only all its ambassadors but also the president and the state secretary.
					
					 The U.S. is openly threatening to put sanctions on those countries which do not come out for implementing "sanctions resolution". This proves the illegality and absurdity of the U.S. anti-DPRK sanctions and pressure campaign.
					
					 The U.S. has now faced strategic inferiority in the DPRK-U.S. stand-off. It is now trying to inveigle other countries into the sanctions and pressure campaign and use them as shields and accomplices for averting the catastrophic disaster approaching it.
					
					 But the U.S. blackmail diplomacy can never work on sensible countries though it may work on a few riff-raffs who are afraid of the might of the boss of the international gangsters or eager for a few dollars. 
					
					 It is quite natural that not only the international community but even those in the U.S. deride the Trump group's pressure diplomacy against the DPRK and they comment "that will prove ineffective." 
					
					 No matter how desperately the U.S. may resort to all sorts of gimmicks to form a network of blockade against the DPRK, it can never check the advance of the just cause of Juche Korea nor can it stop international support and solidarity with the DPRK from increasing.
					
					 Those countries aligning themselves with the U.S., yielding to it, will regret their acts of blindly kowtowing to the modern-day gangsters' empire.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Warmongers' More Frantic War Moves
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Warmongers' More Frantic War Moves
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces are reportedly getting more hell-bent on war moves against the DPRK.
					 The warmongers of the puppet navy announced at the "National Assembly" defense committee on Oct. 19 that they would plan to use Apache helicopters of the 2nd Division of the U.S. imperialist aggression army in a combined operational drill with the U.S.
					
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. ground forces are reported to get hell-bent on drills for skirmish in tunnel of the north side and street battle and purchase of military equipment for them.

articles.title: S. Korea: Emergency Actions Launched against Joint Naval Maneuvers
articles.content:
S. Korea: Emergency Actions Launched against Joint Naval Maneuvers
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Emergency peace actions against the joint naval maneuvers targeting the north were launched all at once in south Korea on October 16 under the sponsorships of political parties and organizations, according to the south Korean Internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 The People's Party called a news conference in Seoul on Oct. 19, at which speakers censured Trump for letting out a flurry of provocative rubbish that he would not rule out a war in the Korean peninsula for the sake of U.S. interests.
					
					 They demanded that the U.S. immediately halt the drills for preemptive attack and come out for peace negotiations with the north.
					
					 The World Peace Action against THAAD and War, made up of more than 70 women's bodies, held a news conference to declare an emergency action of women against the joint naval maneuvers and Trump's visit to south Korea.
					
					 The South Korean Federation of University Students in the 21st Century and other youth and student organizations called a press conference in Seoul to protest against the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and Trump's planned south Korea visit.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) --  The Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its internet website respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" on Oct. 11 to mark the 72nd founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The work, published on October 10, Juche 104 (2015), says that the history of the WPK is a proud course in which it has taken responsible care of the people and led the Korean revolution to victory under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Great Men of DPRK Praised by DR Congo Body
articles.content:
Great Men of DPRK Praised by DR Congo Body
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo released a bulletin "91st Anniversary of Formation of 'DIU'" accompanied by a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung on October 11.
					 The bulletin said:
					
					 More than 90 years have passed since President Kim Il Sung, the founder of socialist Korea, formed the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					
					 He embarked upon the road of revolution in his teens to save the destiny of the country and nation from the rule of the Japanese imperialists and formed the DIU with revolutionaries of younger generation.
					
					 The formation of the DIU on October 17, 1926 was a historic event that declared the new start of the Korean revolution.
					
					 Since then the Korean revolution has made long strides.
					
					 The bulletin elaborated on the feats of Kim Il Sung for the liberation of Korea and the victory in the war, and noted that the Korean people had successfully carried out the post-war rehabilitation and socialist construction.
					
					 It also said that leader Kim Jong Il had firmly defended socialism and laid a solid foundation for building a thriving nation under the banner of Songun.
					
					 Today the Korean people under the leadership of HE Kim Jong Un are steadily advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism and speeding up the building of a prosperous and powerful country while getting full readiness for the final battle against the U.S. imperialists, the bulletin said, stressing:
					
					 Victory and glory are always in store for the Korean revolution started with the formation of the DIU.

articles.title: Representante permanente coreano envia carta al presidente del CS de la ONU
articles.content:
Representante permanente coreano envia carta al presidente del CS de la ONU
Pyongyang, 21 de octubre (ACNC) -- El representante permanente de la RPDC ante la ONU remitio el dia 20 una carta al presidente del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU con respecto a que EE.UU. volvio a escenificar en la Peninsula Coreana el entrenamiento maritimo combinado de gran envergadura con vistas al golpe preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC.
					La misiva senala que los simulacros conjuntos que EE.UU libra sin parar en lo que va de ano son los agresivos tanto en su caracter como en su dimension, y prosigue:
					
					En la presente maniobra naval se movilizaron la flotilla del portaaviones nuclear Ronald Reagan, 3 submarinos nucleares, inclusive el Michigan, mas de 40 buques incluyendo el destructor Aegis y los cazas.
					
					El entrenamiento hizo mas tensa la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana porque tuvo lugar despues de que el mandatario estadounidense hiciera la declaracion de guerra mas brutal al referirse a la "destruccion total" de la RPDC.
					
					Lo insoslayable del caso es que como si eso fuera poco, EE.UU. intensifica la campana de presion militar anti-RPDC y se mueve sin escrupulos para introducir en la Peninsula Coreana a los efectivos de la OTAN y los paises satelites en el tiempo de emergencia.
					
					Los ejercicios militares conjuntos de gran dimension anti-RPDC, iniciados en la Guerra Fria, se tornaron mas grandes y ofensivos despues de este periodo. 
					
					Con la incorporacion del mayor numero de propiedades estrategicas nucleares, se llevan a cabo varias veces al ano, hecho que constituye evidente amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales.
					
					Por eso, demandamos que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU plantee y discuta como agenda urgente el entrenamiento militar conjunto de EE.UU. en virtud de los articulos 34 y 35 de la Carta de la ONU.
					
					No habra otro pais que haya sufrido como la RPDC la amenaza nuclear tan grave, directa y larga de EE.UU. y presenciado en sus narices los ejercicios de guerra nuclear mas brutales tanto en su dimension y forma como en su objetivo y esencia.
					
					De acuerdo con su mision, el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU debera eliminar de raiz el factor de empeoramiento de la situacion y la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana al aceptar la demanda de nuestro pais por la paz y seguridad de esta zona y hacer asi aporte sustancial a la paz y seguridad internacionales.
					
					Si vuelve a desestimar nuestra justa demanda, el Consejo de Seguridad mostrara por si solo que se ha hecho un aparato politico de un pais faltando a su mision y a la confianza de la sociedad internacional.

articles.title: Seleccion coreana avanza a semifinal del Campeonato Sub-19 (f) de la CAF 2017
articles.content:
Seleccion coreana avanza a semifinal del Campeonato Sub-19 (f) de la CAF 2017
Pyongyang, 21 de octubre (ACNC) -- La seleccion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea vencio a su rival chino por 2 a 0 en el ultimo partido de las eliminatorias por grupos del Campeonato Sub-19 (f) de la Confederacion Asiatica de Futbol 2017, que tuvo lugar el dia 21.
					La seleccion coreana avanzara a la siguiente etapa.

articles.title: Periodicos coreanos condenan la escalada de amenaza militar contra la RPDC
articles.content:
Periodicos coreanos condenan la escalada de amenaza militar contra la RPDC
Pyongyang, 21 de octubre (ACNC) -- Los periodicos centrales de Corea divulgaron este sabado sendos comentarios individuales criticando a Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos que amenazan militarmente a la RPDC introduciendo en la Peninsula Coreana muchas propiedades estrategicas nucleares.
					Bajo el pretexto de "mejoramiento de la capacidad ejecutiva de la operacion conjunta", ellos dieron inicio a los ejercicios maritimos conjuntos de maxima envergadura en el Mar Este y el Oeste de Corea. En esta maniobra se movilizaron mas de 40 buques de guerra y aviones de combate como la flotilla de portaaviones norteamericano Ronald Reagan, 3 submarinos nucleares, incluso el Michigan, el destructor Aegis, etc.
					
					Rodong Sinmun senala que EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea llevan a la peor fase la ya delicada situacion de la Peninsula Coreana librando los ejercicios militares conjuntos anti-RPDC en ambos flancos, o sea, en los Mares Este y Oeste.
					
					La situacion actual pone al desnudo la naturaleza belicosa de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos que traen el nubarron de guerra nuclear amenazando la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el Nordeste Asiatico, revela el diario y continua:
					
					Llega al climax la aventura de los imperialistas norteamericanos para provocar la guerra nuclear anti-RPDC amenazandola con fuerzas armadas.
					
					Es una ilusion estupida la idea de EE.UU. de amenazar y asustar a la RPDC para obligarla a retroceder del camino de incremento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado.
					
					A pesar de las maniobras desesperadas de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos, la RPDC no dara ni un paso atras en su senda de completar las fuerzas nucleares del Estado y cumplira sin falta esta meta.
					
					El rotativo Minju Joson declaro que con su victoria en la batalla final antiyanqui, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos mostraran al mundo y a la historia como se arruinan los belicistas.

articles.title: ACNC comenta la diplomacia gangsteril de EE.UU.
articles.content:
ACNC comenta la diplomacia gangsteril de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 21 de octubre (ACNC) -- EE.UU. se esfuerza en todo lo posible por poner en practica la "diplomacia de adhesion de todos en presionar a la RPDC" que toma por su objetivo obligar a las potencias regionales y otros paises del mundo a romper o reducir las relaciones politicas, diplomaticas, economicas y militares con la RPDC.
					En esta campana, encaminada a bloquear totalmente y poner de rodillas al pais socialista, se movilizan el inquilino de la Casa Blanca, el vicepresidente, el secretario de Estado y hasta los asistentes del secretario de Estado quienes imponen a la sociedad internacional escoger al Norte de Corea o EE.UU.
					
					Esta imposicion no es mas que el ultimo pataleo de los que sufrieron la repetida derrota en el enfrentamiento politico y militar con la RPDC.
					
					La "unica superpotencia del mundo" esta suplicando la sancion y presion contra la RPDC hasta al pequeno pais isleno en el Pacifico al que no prestaba ninguna atencion en el pasado.
					
					Si la actitud de EE.UU. fuera legitima, justa y aceptable para la sociedad internacional, no seria necesario mendigar y amenazar a otros paises movilizando no solo a todos sus embajadores en el extranjero sino tambien al mandatario y al secretario de Estado.
					
					Amenaza abiertamente con sancionar a los paises que no ejecutan la "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC, lo cual comprueba lo ilegal e injusto de la campana de sancion y presion anti-RPDC.
					
					EE.UU., que se halla evidentemente en la inferioridad estrategica en la confrontacion con la RPDC, pretende involucrar a otros paises en la sancion y presion a fin de hacerlos complices que le sirvan de protectores de los desastres catastroficos.
					
					Quizas salga con la suya tal diplomacia amenazante de EE.UU. en el caso de algunos paises que le tienen miedo o viven con su ayuda financiera, pero no sera aceptada nunca por los paises independientes.
					
					En la sociedad internacional, incluso en el propio territorio estadounidense, se escuchan las opiniones que se burlan de la "diplomacia" arriba referida vaticinando su fracaso en el caso de la RPDC.
					
					Aunque EE.UU. se vale de todos los medios para formar una red de bloqueo internacional, no puede frenar la justa causa de la Corea del Juche ni impedir el crecimiento de apoyo y solidaridad internacionales con ella.
					
					Se arrepentiran los paises que se dejan llevar por EE.UU., gangster de cuno moderno.
